collection.body_html: Hygienic, durable, and completely plastic-free. Our stainless steel tableware is built to last a lifetime, perfect for toddlers and beyond.

products.title: Babivo Premium Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bottle with Handle
products.body_html:
Premium Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bottle with Thermal Insulation

The Babivo Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bottle is designed to keep your baby's drinks at the perfect temperature for longer. Made with premium food-grade stainless steel, it is durable, rust-resistant, and completely safe for everyday use.

Its thermal insulation technology ensures milk, water, or juice stays warm or cool, making it ideal for both home and travel. The ergonomic easy-grip handle allows little hands to hold the bottle comfortably, encouraging independent feeding.

This versatile stainless steel water cup doubles as a feeding bottle and a thermal flask, ensuring convenience and safety for both parents and infants.

Key Features:

  • Food-Grade Stainless Steel: Safe, durable & long-lasting.

  • Thermal Insulation: Keeps drinks warm or cool for hours.

  • With Handle: Easy for babies & toddlers to hold.

  • Leak-Proof Design: Prevents spills during feeding.

  • Multi-Purpose: Works as a milk feeder or water cup.

Product Image

products.title: Blisdent - Elevate Oral Hygiene with Stainless Steel Tongue Scraper
products.body_html:
"A clean mouth and fresher breath gets easily achieved with Blisdent tongue scraper stainless steel. Blisdent eliminates unpleasant odors while enhancing oral hygiene. With its ergonomic design coupled with a durable material, it exceeds expectations and guarantees reliable performance and is a crucial addition to daily routine."

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Barbara Simons
✅ Verified Buyer


Having a coated breath often creates a lingering bad breath, and a feeling of uncleanliness in the mouth. It’s frustrating and stemming from inadequate oral hygiene with brushing not solving bacteria and debris removal from the tongue’s surface often leading to persistent problems. There’s a constant struggle for many maintaining a fresh breath with optimal health increasingly becoming uncomfortable, reduce self-esteem and self-consciousness. All these issues highlight a need for a truly effective solution for tongue hygiene.

Blisdent’s Tongue Scrapper for Stainless Steel comes with a comfortable U-shape design and medical-grade high-quality stainless steel engineering. It’s a simple and yet, effective operation for optimal oral care thanks to its durable material precisely scrapping off bacteria and any tongue build-up. Blisdent helps boost fresh breath and overall mouth cleanliness and strongly reduces use of temporary fixes and thus, bring a refreshing and smoother daily experience.

 

REASONS WHY BLISDENT TONGUE SCRAPPER STAINLESS STEEL FOR SUPERIOR ORAL HYGIENE

✅ COMFORTABLE AND ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Thanks to the smooth U-shape design, Blisdent comfortably and easily fits into the contours of the tongue. With the ergonomic handle providing a firm grip, the tool allows effective scrapping without any discomfort.

✅ DURABLE MEDICAL-GRADE STEEL: It’s exceptionally durable and rust-proof thanks to the medical-grade construction meaning sterilizing is easy. Thus, Blisdent is a hygienic and long-lasting tongue scrapping tool a perfect addition to daily oral hygiene.


✅ EASY TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN: Blisdent is incredibly simple to clean. A rinse under warm water or cold running water after each use is enough, sterilizing it with boiling water is also sufficient ensuring mouth hygiene with minimal effort.

✅ INSTANT FRESH BREATH: Eliminating the primary source of bad breath is Blisdent’s main attractive feature. The tool offers an immediate and noticeable improvement when it comes to breath freshness. Get confident and enjoy a pleasant oral environment all day.


✅ SUPERIOR BACTERIA REMOVAL: Fully designed to remove bacteria, dead cells, and food debris, Blisdent fits perfectly on to the tongue’s surface. Thanks to the targeted action, it goes beyond what brushing achieves, offering a comprehensive oral hygiene.

 

HOW TO USE BLISDENT TONGUE SCRAPPER STAINLESS STEEL FOR ORAL HYGIENE

1. Rinse Mouth: Before using Blisdent, rinse the mouth, preferably with warm water to help prepare the tongue’s surface.

2. Perfectly align and position the scrapper: Start by placing the curve edge of the scrapper as far back on the tongue with comfort in mind.

3. Scrape Forward: With gentle motions, pull the scraper forward towards the tongue’s tip using even and light pressure.

4. Rinse and Repeat: Ensure you rinse the collected debris under warm water after each scrapping pass. Repeat the process three to four times for a thorough cleaning.

 

The discomfort a coated tongue brings, not forgetting the persistent bad breath and ineffectiveness of daily brushing triggers a sense of hopelessness, reduced oral-consciousness and freshness. Having to constantly rely on mints and mouthwashes for daily hygiene only provides temporary relief, thus increasing daily mouth hygiene effort while still avoiding the root cause of bad odor.

Blisdent’s tongue scrapper for stainless steel features a durable, ergonomic, and medical-grade material for effective tongue scrapping results. Thanks to the build-in scrapping action which is actively removing bacteria and food debris with ease, Blisdent guarantees optimal oral hygiene. Each feature adds to oral cleanliness while promoting fresh breath. It makes it a must-have tool for anyone seeking to improve daily oral hygiene and increase comfort and confidence.

 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

Material: Metal
Product Attributes: Ordinary
Package Size: 170*40*44(mm)
Color: Silver, Rose-Gold, Iron-Gold
Applicable People: General
Specification: 17.5
Function: Tongue Cleaning
Package List: 1PC x Tongue Scrapper

 

A Nestacular Promise

At Nestacular, we believe in the quality of our products, so we offer a 30-day Money-Back Guarantee, no questions asked! When you purchase from us, there is ZERO RISK for you!

Congratulations!

You’ve found a hidden discount code! Use code “TTD” at checkout to claim an additional 10% OFF your ENTIRE order!

Customer Support:

Email: support@nestacular.com

Phone: +1 (800) 913-9932

 

Frequently Asked Questions about Blisdent Tongue Scrapper Stainless Steel

1. What’s the Main Advantage of Using Blisdent?

Helps to effectively remove bacteria, dead cells, and food debris from the tongue, thereby reducing bad breath and having a coated tongue.

2. Is Blisdent Safe for Daily Oral Hygiene Use?

Absolutely, it’s designed for gentle and safe daily use thanks to the smooth ergonomic design helping to effectively clean the tongue’s surface.

3. What Material is this Tongue Scrapper Made from?

Blisdent is made from 100% medical-grade stainless steel making it durable, easy to keep and clean.

4. How does Blisdent Help with Bad Breath?

Originating from bacterial and food debris that accumulates on the tongue, bad breath is a nuisance. Blisdent physically removes the buildup thus, reducing the source of odor, which effectively leads to a fresher breath.

5. Is Blisdent Easy to Clean After Use?

Absolutely! Cleaning the tool is very simple, make sure to rinse it with warm water after each use. For deeper sanitation, its advised to use boiling water.

products.title: Cartoon Stainless Steel Baby Bowl Set - BPA Free 300ml with Spoon
products.body_html:
Cartoon Printed Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bowl Set

This delightful feeding bowl set is designed specifically for your little ones, combining fun and functionality in one adorable package. Made from food-grade PP material and featuring a durable stainless steel liner, this bowl is not only safe for your child but also built to last through all their mealtime adventures.

Product Features:

Material: food grade PP material, stainless steel liner
Product Size: 11.5 * 5.5CM
Product Capacity: 300ML
One Set Includes: bowl + lid + spoon

This bowl features a double-layer design, with a stainless steel inner lining that keeps meals warm and a PP outer layer that is both lightweight and easy to grip. The charming cartoon prints will make mealtime fun and exciting for your little one, encouraging them to eat independently while enjoying their favorite characters.

Please note that it is normal for water to enter the middle layer of the bowl due to the manufacturing process, but rest assured this will not affect the bowl's functionality. For optimal care, avoid placing it in the microwave or disinfection cabinet.

Why Choose Our Baby Bowl Set?

  • BPA Free: Safety is our priority, and this bowl set is free from harmful chemicals.
  • Insulated Design: Keeps food warm for longer, perfect for those slower eaters.
  • Easy to Clean: The stainless steel liner is easy to wipe down, making cleanup a breeze.
  • Perfect Size: Ideal for toddlers aged 1-2 years, with a 300ml capacity that's just right for small portions.
  • Fun and Engaging: The bright, cartoon designs are sure to capture your child's attention and make mealtime enjoyable.

products.title: Insulated Baby Bowl Set 300ml - Stainless Steel BPA Free with Spoon
products.body_html:
Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bowl Set with Double Insulation

The Cute Cartoon Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bowl Set provides safe, enjoyable mealtime experiences for your little one. Crafted from high-quality food-grade stainless steel, this dinnerware set combines safety with fun through vibrant cartoon designs that encourage independent eating and flavor exploration.

Product Specifications

Material: Stainless Steel
Color: As shown in the pictures
Function: Dinnerware Set
Age Range: Suitable for babies over 3 months
Pattern Type: Cartoon
Material Feature: BPA Free, Latex Free
Classification: Dinnerware Set
Origin: CN (China)
Diameter: 11-11.9 CM

Size Chart

Size------------Length----------Height--------------Width
One Size-------15cm/5.91------6cm/2.36--------11.5cm/4.53

Key Features

This innovative bowl set features double heat insulation layers, maintaining food temperature while protecting little hands from burns. The curved handle design accommodates tiny grips, while the non-slip bottom ensures feeding stability. The smooth surface and durable pattern facilitate easy cleaning, maximizing mealtime enjoyment.

The bowl serves multiple functions as complementary food bowl or training bowl for larger portions. Its colorful design brightens dining tables while engaging baby attention, creating fun and interactive mealtimes.

Package Contents

Package includes:
1 x Bowl + 1 x Spoon
Note:
1. Please allow 0.3-0.8 cm error due to manual measurement. Ensure you are comfortable with this before purchasing.
2. Due to the difference between monitors, the actual product may vary slightly from the images shown.

products.title: TotDream Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bottle – Safe, Insulated Toddler Milk Bottle for Easy Feeding
products.body_html:
Ensure your toddler enjoys warm milk anytime with the TotDream Stainless Steel Baby Feeding Bottle. Designed for safety and convenience, this insulated bottle keeps milk at the ideal temperature for hours, making feeding easier both at home and on the go.

Crafted from premium, food-grade stainless steel, it’s durable, non-toxic, and BPA-free. The ergonomic design makes it easy for toddlers to hold, while the secure lid prevents leaks and spills. Perfect for busy parents who want a reliable, mess-free feeding solution.

Key Features:

  • Insulated Stainless Steel: Keeps milk warm or cool for extended periods.

  • Leakproof Design: Prevents accidental spills.

  • Safe & Durable: BPA-free, food-grade materials.

  • Ergonomic Shape: Easy for toddlers to grip.

  • Portable & Convenient: Ideal for travel, daycare, and home use
